pages.text: An imperfect ritual that channels the arcane power of Iron's Spellbooks through blood magic, granting devastating echoing strikes in combat.$(br2)$(bold)Requires:$() Iron's Spellbooks$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place an Arcane Anvil on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 3500 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() 15 minutes

pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone to receive:$(li)$(thing)Echoing Strikes III$() for 15 minutes$(li)Effect has no visible particles$(br2)$(bold)Echoing Strikes:$()$(br)Iron's Spellbooks' Echoing Strikes effect causes your melee attacks to echo, dealing additional damage to targets.$(br2)$(bold)Use Cases:$()$(li)Extended combat encounters$(li)Boss fights$(li)Melee-focused builds$(br2)$(italic)Blood and steel become one.$()
